titles.title: For the relief of Henry R. Jones.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 11/8/1999--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of his claims against the United States arising out of his cooperation as an informant for the Drug Enforcement Administration.
